Suppose you have a plot

```{r thumbnail}
set.seed(1)
res <- rnorm(n=1000,mean=0,sd=1)
hist(res,breaks = 100)
```

If you want to use this knitr chunk's figure output as thumbnail, put 
`thumbnail` as the chunk name. Run `blogdown::serve_site()`, then run the `Insert thumbnail` addin.
